content.title: Adding Delete Feature
content.body:
1. From the left menu of the Action Editor, under Function, select Add Snippet.
  2. On the right pane of the Action Editor, provide the following code:
    self.view.forceLayout();
  3. From the left menu of the Action Editor, under General, select Set Timeout.
  4. In the right pane of the mapping editor, provide the following values:
    • Delay: 2
